summary: When a disgraced former college dean has a romance with a mysterious younger woman haunted by her dark, twisted past, he is forced to confront a shocking fact about his own life that he has kept secret for fifty years.
cast: Anthony Hopkins|Nicole Kidman|Ed Harris|Gary Sinise|Wentworth Miller|Jacinda Barrett|Harry Lennix|Clark Gregg|Anna Deavere Smith|Lizan Mitchell|Kerry Washington|Phyllis Newman|Margo Martindale|Ron Canada|Mili Avital|Danny Blanco Hall|Marie Michel|Anne Dudek|Mimi Kuzyk|John Finn|Jessica Winterstern|Jeff Perry|Rick Snyder|Danny Stone|Vito DeFilippo|Robert Higden|Vlasta Vrana|Richard Mawe|Tom Rack|Bill Rowat|Richard Russo|Andrew Forge|Stella Hopkins|Jude Beny|Peter Cunningham|John Cenatiempo|Frank Proctor|Deano Clavet|Sylvain Doré|Neville Edwards|Phillip Colette Gervais|Allison Davis|Charles Woods Gray|Edward Lafferty|Steven Grisé|Kim Gandol Ferenczi|Terry Haig|Laurent Imbault|Sylvain Landry|Pierre LeBlanc|Nwamiko Madden|Luc Morissette|Philip Pretten|Jessica Schulte|Kate Whitney|Brea Asher|Russell Yuen|Jimmy Chan|Lydia Zadel|Leigh Spofford
title: La mancha humana
